h1. Intro


This library contains useful GWT widgets.

h1. Requirements

||Java|sdk 1.6|
||Maven|3.x|
||GWT|2.5.x|


h1. Usage

h2. Project pom

Include this dependency in your pom :

{code:xml}
<dependency>
	<groupId>it.softphone.rd.gwt</groupId>
	<artifactId>commons-gwt</artifactId>
	<version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>
{code}

h2. Gwt project

Inherit these modules in your gwt project :

{code:xml}
<inherits name='it.softphone.rd.gwt.CommonsWidget'/>
<inherits name='it.softphone.rd.model.Model'/>
{code}
